episodes.title: Stark Raving Dad
episodes.plot: Homer accidentally lands in a mental hospital and ends up sharing a room with a white man who thinks he is Michael Jackson.

episodes.title: Mr. Lisa Goes to Washington
episodes.plot: After winning a political essay contest, Lisa is invited to Washington, D.C., but she soon becomes upset after discovering how policy-making really works.

episodes.title: When Flanders Failed
episodes.plot: After wishing for Flanders to lose his business, Homer discovers that his neighbor is actually about to go bankrupt and decides to help him out.

episodes.title: Bart the Murderer
episodes.plot: After having a horrible day, Bart gets a job tending bar for a group of gangsters and becomes the prime suspect when Principal Skinner mysteriously disappears.

episodes.title: Homer Defined
episodes.plot: Homer is a hero after averting a nuclear meltdown that he nearly caused, but he doesn't want to tell anyone that he stopped it completely by accident.

episodes.title: Like Father, Like Clown
episodes.plot: Bart and Lisa try to reunite Krusty the Clown with his father.

episodes.title: Treehouse of Horror II
episodes.plot: The Simpson family receives a severed monkey's paw which can grant wishes, Bart gains magical powers which he uses to turn Homer into a Jack-in-the-box, and Mr. Burns uses Homer's brain to create a robot.

episodes.title: Lisa's Pony
episodes.plot: Homer buys Lisa a pony that the family can ill afford.

episodes.title: Saturdays of Thunder
episodes.plot: After Homer fails a fathering test, he decides to help Bart build his Soap Box Derby racer.

episodes.title: Flaming Moe's
episodes.plot: Moe claims a drink that Homer invented is his own, with the drink making the bar a local hot spot, but threatens his friendship with Homer.

episodes.title: Burns Verkaufen der Kraftwerk
episodes.plot: Burns decides to retire and sells the power plant to a German consortium for an exorbitant price. Homer's laziness and inefficiency are quickly exposed by his new bosses, and he is laid off.

episodes.title: I Married Marge
episodes.plot: As Marge goes to the doctor for a pregnancy test, Homer tells the children of the events leading up to his marriage, and Bart's birth.

episodes.title: Radio Bart
episodes.plot: After Bart receives a microphone which can transmit through radios, he decides to pull a series of pranks and eventually convinces the town that a boy has fallen down a well.

episodes.title: Lisa the Greek
episodes.plot: Homer uses Lisa (and her prognostic skills) to help him bet on football games.

episodes.title: Homer Alone
episodes.plot: While Marge spends a couple of days at Rancho Relaxo after she has a breakdown, Bart and Lisa stay with Patty and Selma, and Homer stays at home to take care of Maggie.

episodes.title: Bart the Lover
episodes.plot: After Mrs. Krabappel gives Bart a month of detention, he gets his revenge by responding to her newspaper singles ad; Homer uses a swear jar to cut down on his cursing.

episodes.title: Homer at the Bat
episodes.plot: Homer and his co-workers qualify for the plant softball team's league final, but Mr. Burns hires nine professional MLB players in order to win a $1 million bet.

episodes.title: Separate Vocations
episodes.plot: Lisa and Bart take an examination at the school that is supposed to determine what they will be when they grow up, but the kids are not so sure.

episodes.title: Dog of Death
episodes.plot: After the Simpsons regret paying for an expensive surgery for Santa's Little Helper, he runs away from home and is trained by Mr. Burns to become an attack dog.

episodes.title: Colonel Homer
episodes.plot: Homer becomes the manager of a beautiful young country singer and finds himself almost attracted to her, sparking Marge's jealousy.

episodes.title: Black Widower
episodes.plot: Sideshow Bob gets out of jail and plots to take his revenge on Bart by marrying his Aunt Selma and killing her.

episodes.title: The Otto Show
episodes.plot: After Otto loses his job as school bus driver because he does not have a license, Bart convinces Homer and Marge to let Otto stay with them until he gets back on his feet.

episodes.title: Bart's Friend Falls in Love
episodes.plot: Bart becomes jealous when Milhouse falls in love with a new student named Samantha; Homer accidentally receives a vocabulary-building tape instead of a weight-loss one.

episodes.title: Brother, Can You Spare Two Dimes?
episodes.plot: After Homer "wins" a $2000 settlement with the plant for radiation affecting his sperm count, his brother Herb comes to Springfield with an idea that could help him get his fortune back.
